intension: Design a Facebook event cover for a winter decoration workshop featuring lectures and demonstrations by Miranda Yates, Sam Knightly, Zachary Evans, and Veronica Floyd on December 24 at Lafayette Studio.
globalcaption: The image features a pink background with a green wreath made of pine cones and a bow. The wreath is placed in the center of the image, and it appears to be the main focus. The background is adorned with a variety of pine cones scattered around, creating a festive and holiday-themed atmosphere.
keywords: winter, pink, green, decoration, holiday, christmas, celebration, tree, xmas, festive, merry, new year, garland, wreath, workshop, facebook, event cover, cover, fb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a pink background with a green pine tree in the center. The pine tree is adorned with a variety of ornaments, including several pine cones and a bow. The pine cones are scattered around the tree, with some closer to the top and others near the bottom. The bow is placed near the top of the tree, adding a festive touch to the scene. The combination of the pink background and the green pine tree creates a visually appealing and holiday-themed image
